name: Air Fryer Roasted Broccoli and Cauliflower
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Don't want to heat up the house by turning on the oven? Try this fast, easy, and perfectly roasted broccoli and cauliflower side dish in your air fryer. Garnish with a squeeze of lemon or Parmesan cheese, if desired.
directions: Heat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) following manufacturer's instructions
Place broccoli florets in a large, microwave-safe bowl
Cook in the microwave on high power for 3 minutes
Add cauliflower, olive oil, garlic powder, sea salt, paprika, and black pepper to the bowl with the broccoli
Pour mixture into the air fryer basket
Cook for 12 minutes, tossing vegetables halfway through cooking time for even browning
